short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings back slideshows for Imgur galleries

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an enlarged image viewer and automatic slideshow with adjustable speed for Imgur galleries.  Just navigate to a gallery and click on the "Slidur" button that appears in the header of the post.
